TopicTitle: A mod to change the amount of elevon deflection

Articles.Content: Much like the elevon deflections found on FAR, only without the entire aerodynamics rework.
You can use ModuleControlSurfaceFix with "Plus" enabled from here
You could also probably use Dynamic Deflection to do this - just set it to 60% everywhere, for instance.

Tried both, it wasn't what I was looking for, but it is close enough.

Would there be any alternatives left?

Well,there is also FSwing in Firespitter,but that means you'll need to configure every thing yourself.

Here are file documentation,if you want to investigate further.
